attributes.action: Visit Troops and Travel by Land Rover
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the prime minister to pay a comprehensive visit to all the troops serving in Afghanistan and travel by Land Rover. He would gain enormous respect . In the past our Great Leaders have always visited the troops in the Combat Zone Our Royal family send members to serve at the front line. I believe the Commander in Chief should never send anyone to do anything he is not prepared to do himself. Its called leadership.
